1.content: Choose the setting of your story.
1.title: Choose your setting!

111.content: So which type of Youkai would you like?
111.title: Weight gain

choices: After breakfast, Megumi notices Kaoru staring at her full stomach.
Later that day, Megumi finds some erotic magazines of Kaoru's.
1112.content:
Megumi Evans sighed to herself as she observed her model-like figure in the mirror.

It was all becoming so dull to the twenty six year old. Dieting, practically starving oneself sometimes, exercising at all hours of the day. But besides the rigors of keeping her figure, there was another reason that she sighed at her reflection, said reason soon wrapping her arms around Megumi's waist.

"Morning," Kaoru whispered in her lover's ear.

For a moment, Megumi allowed herself to moan at her tanuki girlfriend's touch, but soon stopped herself as she realized that Kaoru was just nuzzling into her and not starting with her bites along the neck, which was what she used to do before they really started getting intimate.

Oh, at first their nearly two year relationship had been wonderful. They'd gone at it like rabbits, nearly insatiable, but then something happened and Kaoru withdrew a bit. Oh they still had a love life and they still loved one another, but Megumi could tell that something was off with her girlfriend.

"Morning," she finally replied.

"You're not going to work out soon, are you?"

"No, I don't really feel like it."

Kaoru grinned at that and began kissing along Megumi's collarbone. "Great, I'll cook us up a nice big meal and we can stay in all day!"
1112.title: A Fox youkai(fox girl)

11133.content: How about a more scaly-Youkai?
11133.title: More choices.

111332.content: Okay while we're still on scaly how about a Lizard/Dragon-Youkai?
111332.title: More choices please

1113322.content: How about Mermaids? They can be Youkai as well. Not to mention a whole diversity of Fish-girls(like Whale-Girls, Shark-Girls, etc).
1113322.title: A Fishy view of things

choices: Let's see what else there is...
11133222.content:
Kinda.

Keeping to the aquatic theme for a bit, how about a Kappa?
11133222.title: Coming out of your shell.

choices: Yes there's plenty more to choose
111332222.content: I'm honestly surprised it hasn't been used yet. Who doesn't love a Tanuki?
111332222.title: Tanuki Time

choices: Mei makes a run for it
1113322221.content:
The life of Shiro Ryunosuke has always been a rather uneventful one. He hasn't led a most interesting life, mostly just drifting through at his own pace. Decent grades at school, basic living, working class, simple looks. Needless to say Shiro wasn't the most interesting person, but he was content with himself, having a stable job and a cosy apartment set in the busy districts of Tokyo's Shibuya district by 23 years of age.

He worked in an rather old shop, Shinonome Antiques and Oddities, which had been run by the family of said name since the early 20s. It's current owner, whom Shiro simply knew as Mr Shinonome, was the fourth in the family line to run the store. He was a seasoned man, being in his late 40s and having worked since he was in his late teens, but he was also a honest man who ran a tight ship. He was fair to Shiro, giving him a raise when he felt his standard of work had improved and even willingly deducting his own pay when times got tough. Needless to say, Shiro was glad to have him as a boss.

It was a rather bland Wedensday morning, the sky being cloudy with no sunshine to brighten up the overcrowded streets. Heading out with his messy hair flowing in the wind, a simple T-shirt and jacket combo with some worn jeans, Shiro quickly made his way to the Shinonome store, with the store owner standing by his desk as he entered.

"Good morning Mr Shinonome." Shiro called out. He took note of his boss, seeing that he was putting on a pair of gloves. "Going to the coffee shop across the road again Sir?"

The aged man shook his head, his semi bald head soon covered by a woollen hat. "Actually no Ryunosuke. Sorry to tell you on such short notice, but I need to make a trip to Takayama. Some family business needs to be sorted over there, I only found out last night. I'll be gone for about a week or so."

"Surely you're getting someone to look after the store when you're gone?" Shiro replied, somewhat worried.

The Shinonome elder wagged an annoyed finger at Shiro. "There you are jumping to conclusions, I told you to work on that Ryunosuke." He rolled his eyes a little. "Of course someone will look after the store, why else would I be here? They've been living in Tokyo for a few months and I trust them well, so you should be fine." The older man yelled towards the back of the store. "The assistant has just arrived!"

"Coming!" A rather shrill voice called from the store's back. Hurrying along, Shiro saw a young girl, around his age coming toward him and Mr Shinonome. A little out of breath, the girl bowed down and gave a smile.

"Greetings! I'm Mei Shinonome! I hope you will enjoy working with me for the next week!" Taking a good look at her, Shiro took note of Mei's interesting looks. Her hair instantly stood out, being a near perfect chestnut brown just reaching to her shoulders, looking well groomed and bouncy, full of life. Her face sported a pair of tiny yet useful glasses, along with some thick brown eyebrows above her eyes, giving her face a distinct look. Her face also had a somewhat full look to it. Taking note of the girl's general body shape, Shiro could see the girl was fairly on the chubby side. Downwards, the girl sported a deep brown turtleneck sweater, covering her neck and wrists, reaching down to connect with the waistband of her skirt, a long article of clothing which stopped at her shins, a basic grey colour with a lined pattern on them.

Mr Shinonome gave the girl a few pats on the shoulder. "From looking at her you wouldn't think she was my daughter, huh?" He chuckled to himself. "She gets all that from her mother, she's like a miniature version of her!" He soon made a move for the door. "Now that my Mei has gotten herself acquainted to the store, I hope that you'll both get on well during the week. See you all until then." With a final wave, Mr Shinonome closed the door and got into his car, leaving the two of them alone.

Shiro spoke up quickly. "So what do you want me to Miss Shinono-"

Mei began to giggle. "Oh stop that! My dad might have said I look like my Mom, but it doesn't mean you have to treat me like her! Call me Mei, hmm?"

"Oh, alright then!" Shiro spoke up once more, more urgently. He didn't know why he felt so uneasy around this girl.

"Now, what's your first name?" Mei asked curiously. "I sure don't want to call you Ryunosuke all the time!"

"It's Shiro, Mis- I mean Mei."

"Alright then Shiro, time to work." She clasped her hands together. "Now, what I want you to do is to sort out all the new antiques from the shipping area, whilst I go to the storage room to sort through the paper work for these shipments. Okay with that?" She pointed a slender finger at him.

"Sure thing Mei. I'll let you know when I'm done." Shiro replied. He received an adorably sweet smile in return.

"Have a good time working!" Mei clutched her fist before walking back to the storage room, near skipping along.

And so the working day had begun. Shiro spent his time doing the task at hand, opening boxes and taking out various old belongings from previous owners, with hopes that they would be able to sell them for more than they bought them for. It was pretty simple work, but the grating sound of cardboard rubbing together did get on Shiro's nerves. Thankfully he was done in not too long, leaving him with nothing to do now that the new shipments were sorted.

Seeing no other choice, he moved over to the storage room so he could meet up with Mei, seeing if there was anything else, most likely yes, to be done. Entering the storage room, he saw her with her back turned, sorting through a couple of the aforementioned paper work documents. She hadn't heard him come in, so Shiro took it upon himself to move forward to her so to get her attention. With still no awareness from her, Shiro decided to give her a tap on the shoulder. After all, her father had done it to her, so it wouldn't be bad if he did it?

With Shiro's hand landing onto Mei's shoulder, a shriek of fear filled the room as Mei near jumped out of her skin. Shiro heard this, but soon found himself seeing something too. His eyes were blinded by a massive furry object, smacking into his face and covering the front of his body. He was sent backwards, taking a few steps back and rubbing his eyes so to collect himself. When he opened them again, he heard a gasp from Mei, his eyesight centring on her. Instantly, he noticed something different about her.

Mei didn't look too different, with things being added to her look rather than her look outright altering. On her head he noticed two sizeable ears, giving her two sets. One was distinctively human, whilst the others resembling that of an animal's, like a cat. Behind her, lay a massive bushy tail, ring tailed in the pattern of black and brown, the brown matching her hair colour. Shiro's eyes widened as he saw the full scene, with Mei standing with her mouth agap.

"Mei....you...you're..."
1113322221.title: From Humble Beginnings

choices: Mei explains the rest over some lunch.
11133222212.content:
Before he could finish his words, Mei fled from the scene, heading towards the store floor. Shiro's mind was racing at incredible speeds to process just what he had saw. A set of animal like ears and a long and bushy tail. Certainly this could have been part of an elaborate prank set up by the father and daughter. But then why would she just run away like that. He thoughts leading him no where, it was best to simply search for her and find the answers himself. Running into the store, he began to call out her name but she didn't respond.

"Figures, if she was hiding why the hell would she answer." he said to himself as he began to look around for her. The store itself was about the size of your average mom and pop store, but it was crammed with so many displays and antiques that it was incredibly easy to get lost. He quickly scanned the routes he thought would be the fastest to get through and began his search, looking for any signs of her. After five minutes of searching, he came across something that caught his eye. It was a marble statue that stood in the middle of a display, but there was something off about it. First off, he had personally placed that statue in a different location just the day before. Those were particularly heavy and required at least two people to help carry it. Secondly, the statue had furry ears on its head and a tail wrapped around it's midsection. So based on his thoughts, his rationale wasn't incorrect. Placing his arms on the sides of the statue, he held it quite firmly.

"Mei?" he asked, keeping his grip on the object. With a flash of smoke, he heard a small thump as he fell over, something quite heavy landing on his midsection. The smoke clearing, he was certain it wasn't the statue as he would have been greatly injured.

"Oh dear, seems like you discovered my little secret." said Mei, now sitting pretty on top of Shiro, not knowing just how much pressure she was putting on him. Her rear pressing against his midsection, her legs dangled from the side and she rested her hands on his broad chest. Looking up at her, Shiro felt his face warm up slightly as he began to see just how cute she was.

"Alright, before you start explaining everything, do you mind getting off of me?"

"Oh of course." said Mei as she slowly lifted her chubby self off of the young man. After feeling the weight off of him, he stood up and dusted himself off, getting a good look of her furry cute ears and her tail which was wrapped around her middle in a protective fashion.

"So I'm guessing that I'm not hallucinating or dreaming or anything like that. I suppose you should start explaining?"

"Well it's not much to explain. I'm what people consider a 'Youkai,' a half animal human hybrid."

"A Youkai huh? Considering that leaf on your head, you're a tanuki type aren't you?" said Shiro, pointing towards the small green leaf that was on top of her brown haired head.

"Ah yes, that is a rather unique leaf among my species. It allows us to transform into different objects with virtually no differences in composition or structure."

"Well I wouldn't say no differences, your transformation did have ears and a tail." Mei blushed in embarrassment at the comment, oblivious to the fact that her powers were still in an immature state.

"I'm still rather young for a tanuki so my powers tend to be on the fritz every now and then." explained the young woman, slightly fidgeting with nervousness. He took this all in, his rational mind attempting to accept something so foreign and unscientific. Falling back on the idea of not everything being able to be explained, he decided it was best to simply go along with it.

"So was the Boss also a tanuki?" At his words, she shook her head, her brown hair tussling back and forth.

"Oh no, Papa is a genuine human. He married my mama and here I am!" she said with a proud smile. Trying to not think too much of the strange genetics at play, he had no idea that his boss held such a secret for so long. With everything taken into account, it seemed like his quiet little life was stirring up to become something much much more than he ever expected. As he watched the tanuki girl continue to smile, there was something he could tell real easily from this whole situation.

'Looks like things are going to get real interesting. Whether that's going to be something good or bad is something that's left to fate I guess."
11133222212.title: Here's to You, the Moment is Yours

choices: More discussion is had through lunch
Lunch finishes up for the two
111332222121.content:
As he continued to think about the turn in his life with the smiling Mei before him, he heard a low growl come from the room. He had an idea what it was, this being soon confirmed by the embarrassed look on her face, her smile scrunching up as she blushed.

"Hungry?" Shiro asked. "We can get ourselves some lunch if you wanted, it's just about time as it for some anyway." As he spoke Mei's ears pricked up, visibly perking upwards on end.

"Well, if you don't mind, then we'll eat!" In a puff of smoke Mei turned into a backpack, Tanuki tail and ears visible as the bag opened, letting an oversized lunch container fall out of the backpack, before Mei turned back into her usual self, picking up her container gleefully.

"How does that even work?" Shiro questioned once more. "I mean, were you storing your lunch inside yourself..."

"Don't look too much into it, I don't myself!" The Tanuki replied as she looked over at her lunch, smelling the aroma of various meats and snacks which were all contained in the one holder.

"If you say so" Shiro was about to get his own lunch before he stopped. "Wait...Mei can you transform again?"

"Oh?" Quickly she turned herself into Shiro, her tail and ears still visible. "Why do you ask?" She asked in his own voice, tail swishing behind his doppelganger.

"Mei, is that the Tanuki sound effect from Super Mario Bros 3"

"......No" She replied simply, eyes averting his gaze as she returned to normal form, the sound clearly audible, sticking out plainly as Shiro now noticed it.

After an awkward silence Mei cracked. "Okay, it is!" She grabbed her tail and held it tight with both hands as she confessed. "It was my favourite game as a kid, It was the only game I knew where you could play as a Tanuki!" She puffed her cheeks out in a rather silly attempt to look angry. "Besides, it's not like you've never remembered things from your childhood!"

Shiro smiled, rather humoured by her admittedly cute reaction. "I do. I just don't remember in such a nerdy way."

"Nerdy?!" Mei was visibly off guard, her tail standing up tall as he uttered the word. "I'm not a nerd! I'm far from it! I never even beat the game!"

He couldn't help but laugh, trying his best to keep his chuckle restrained. "Okay okay, you're not nerdy Mei. Come on, you eat your food before it gets cold." Shiro went over to his own bag, getting his own lunch which was significantly smaller than Mei's. He sat down next to her at a table in the office she was working in, Mei already ravenously eating the chunks of meat in a cup of soup, tiny patters of soup dabbled onto her lips.

"So, let's get some questions out the way." Shiro asked. "Are there more of you out there? Or are you a last of your kind case?"

"Oh, there's plenty alright!" She replied, having seemingly gotten over his comments from earlier quickly. "There's tons and tons of us out there. In fact my best friend is a Kitsune!"

"I see." Shiro replied. "Kitsune have the whole tail thing right? Where they're old on how many tails they have?"

Mei nodded quickly, with a mouthful of snack foods, which she soon swallowed. "Yeah, she's got that. She's got 4 tails so she's like 400 years old! I don't know her exact age, she doesn't like to talk about it much..."

"Maybe you could bring her around sometime? Customers are sparse during the early hours like now so it shouldn't be too much of a problem for her to come."

She gave some thought before nodding again, her ears fluttering as she did. "Usually she tends to be busy, but mornings should be fine for her!"

From there, the conversation petered off, both of them back to eating their food. While Mei had no trouble with this, Shiro felt the need to at least salvage the talk between them. It seemed she'd gotten over her secret being found out quickly, whilst he was still wrapping his head around just the idea of any mythological creatures existing. That thought gave him a topic to talk about.

"You know, when I was hit with your tail when I scared you it felt really soft." It was a simple passing comment, but he knew she's respond.

"Oh...ah...t-thank you Shiro." Mei's blush was back, smiling lightly as she glanced to the side. "Sorry about it hitting you like that...I lose my concentration when I'm scared and it makes me lose my form..."

"Hey, it's no problem." Shiro added. "Like I said, it was soft so it didn't hurt me or anything." While the conversation hadn't sparked up completely again, Shiro was at least happy at how he'd brought out a smile onto Mei's face rather easily.
111332222121.title: Getting to know you

1113322221212.content:
After around ten more minutes of smalltalk, the two had finished their lunch. Mei in particular was quite satisfied, having eaten plenty for a girl of her stature. While he didn't outright say it, Shiro could understand why the tanuki had such a chubby build, not that he minded. The girl was plenty cute regardless. Cleaning up in the break room, the two headed back into the main store floor, Mei having already changed back into a human form, her ears and tail disguised.

"Shiro, I need you to move these from storage onto the main floor." said Mei as she handed Shiro a clipboard of items to move around. He glanced them over, instantly recognizing each and every one of them, after all he was the one to move them into storage in the first place.

"Alright I got it. Make sure to put the close sign to open, don't want to drive off customers after all." he said as he headed to storage, leaving Mei to happily walk over to the sign and flip it to show that they were open for business. Heading over to the cash register, she began to look over some more paperwork, making sure that there weren't any pressing issues. As this went on, Shiro continued his work, lifting bust, paintings and the odd antique here and there. Around an hour would pass, enough for him to finish his work and for Mei to complete a few sales. Going into the restroom to wipe down his face after the intensive labor, he headed back to Mei for more instructions.

"That's everything Mei. What's next?"

"Well, nothing really pressing. It's still pretty early. Why don't you help me handle the cash register?" By her words, he understood that it meant to just hang out with her at the station. With a nod, he sat himself down right next to her, finding the stool to be as uncomfortable as he remembered. As they underwent some more small talk once more, a thought was persisting in the back of his head.

'Fluffy tail.' is what was currently floating around in his mind. He recalled just how soft and fluffy her tail looked. While he considered himself to be a rational young man who never really gave into temptation, he just wanted to hug that tail properly at least once.

"What are you thinking about?" she asked, inspecting his rather plain face.

"What do you mean?"

"I'd looked like you were deep in though. What were you thinking of?" she asked once more, turning her head and bringing in her face much closer. He backed up by instinct, not wanting to create a scene. It seemed that the tanuki had no sense of personal space.

"Oh, well I was just thinking of something rather soft."

"My tail?" she said bluntly, causing him to gain a look of surprise on his face. He turned his head away, feeling flushed out of embarrassment for getting caught of thinking of such a thing.

"How'd you know?"

"Just a hunch, it isn't the first time after all." she said with a smirk as she quickly untransformed herself to reveal her long and fluffy tail. He looked at her in confusion once more. Just what was she playing at? "Feel free to play with it for the meantime. I know how it makes people, just do it long enough to get it out of your system." she said this time with a rather warm smile. She presented her tail right in front of him and he felt his thoughts go blank and simply hugged the tail, driving his face right into the fluffiness. She had done this a numerous amount of time, even with her own parents. However, in this situation, it seemed to be a bit more, her face started to light up in a red hue.

"It really is soft..." he muttered, feeling warmth envelop his very core.
1113322221212.title: Killy Killy Joker

112.content: Let's start with the basics of expansion.
112.title: Expansion (any type)

12.content: Now choose your type of expansion
12.title: Fantasy

121.content: So which type of Youkai do you want gaining?
121.title: Weight gain

1212.content:
You are a Knight from the Kingdom of Gloria, a principality of many creeds and peoples, such as humans, fox-people, cat-men, and others. These non-human people are known as Youkai, and although at first have waged war upon humanity, over the centuries they have assimilated and adapted to peace. As a child, you have always aspired to be a Knight and you got your chance when your local lord saw your skills in a local tournament with you as the winner. As his Knight, you are on a trek towards the capital of Griffin to deliver several documents pretaining to your lord's lands. You are totting on your white steed, named Brave, and you see the capital in sight, a great city with a magnificent castle atop of a plateau of crystal.

How old are you?
1212.title: A fox youkai(fox girl)

12121.content: A rather young Knight! Skilled you are indeed, but what race are you? Are you human or Youkai?

121212.content:
Akane couldn't help but gawk at the city ahead. Not that this was the youkai's first time visiting Griffin, but the sight of the capitol sitting atop the crystal plateau was always a breathtaking sight. As the young knight approached the city gates, a friendly guard flagged the youkai down.

"Hail, friend! Welcome to Griffin, jewel of the Gloria empire! What brings you here?"

"Hail, good sir! Lord Septus sends me with papers and documents regarding his holdings. I'm to bring them before the king."

"Really now? Well, fear not if you don't get to meet the king, one of his many dignitaries can most likely take care of this." Akane appeared a little crestfallen and slumped forward a little in the saddle. "More importantly, we were told Sir Akane would be delivering the documents. Did something become of him?"

"No, no, nothing of the sort! I AM Knight Akane! And as you can see, I'm perfectly fine." The guard looked the Youkai up and down as if to size it up.

"Hrrrmm. You seem awfully small to be a knight. I've seen crustaceans bigger than you." Akane's ears flattened in irritation at the guard's disbelief. "In any case, let's help you of your horse and get you out of that armor. Then we can bring up to the castle to deliver those documents, Sir Akane."
121212.title: Youthful Youkai

choices: They arrive just in time for dinner.
1212122.content:
Akane unbuckled her helmet and stored it under her arm, revealing long red locks (currently coifed back to fit beneath the headgear) and a pair of perky fox ears.

"I would like that very much, thank you." The guard looked at her with minor confusion before helping the young kitsune off Brave.

"Lady Akane, my mistake. You are just full of surprises." Alane wrinkled her nose at the man's dry wit and turned her head to him while some squires at hand helped remove the armor from her.

"And what's that supposed to mean?"

"Oh, no offense, milady. Just that you're scarcely twelve-"

"Thirteen, thank you very much."

"Thirteen, a youkai, and a woman to boot. Any one of those qualities in a knight is uncommon, all three makes you a rarity indeed.

The kitsune girl smiled to herself as she led Brave into the stables. She let a note if pride creep into her voice as she replied, "Take it as a testament to my prowess."

"That's certainly the positive way to look at it," the guard muttered beneath his breath. One of the benefits of being a fox spirit/demon/monster, though, was keen hearing courtesy of those fluffy ears atop her head. Akane decided to let the comment slide. Bringing it up wouldn't do either of them any good.

"Thanks helping me get settled after my journey. Brave is a good horse, you shouldn't have much problem with him. Now then, let sojourn off to deliver these letters."
1212122.title: Girls Can Be Knights Too

choices: Time to turn in for the night.
12121221.content:
The path up the plateau and to the castle was a long one along a seemingly ever present slope. The pair passed several taverns on the way up, each one eliciting a gurgle from Akane's stomach, and by time they passed their fourth one, the youkai gave up the thought of resisting their temptation. She parted off to one, much to the guard's dismay.

"Lady Akane, don't you have some missives to deliver?"

"I think those can wait. They're important, but they aren't THAT important. Meanwhile, I had a long and hard ride here with nothing to eat save trail rations. I'm ready for a proper meal."

They entered a place called Gremlin Inn and were greeted by a buxom bartender with a large grin stretched across her face.

"Well hey there, Otto. Finally relieved of your post, huh? You never told me you had such a distinguished young daughter."

"Velissa, why would-," the kitsune held up a hand to quiet Otto before he said something she probably wouldn't like.

"I appreciate the compliment, but your friend is actually escorting me up to the palace. I just decided to eat here on the way up."

"Oh I see. Gotcha. He's just acting as your "escort". Don't worry sweetie, we'll make sure to treat you two well." Akane couldn't help but blush and avert her eyes at the comment, partially out of a wounded ego and partially in sharing Otto's feelings. She supposed outside of her armor, her breeches and coiled hair made her look less like a noble knight and more like a tomboyish girl. And given how illegitimate youkai children were treated, Otto's heated response wouldn't have been too out of line either.

Once seated, the bushy tailed knight put her earnings to hard work. Famished from her journey thus far and a teenager to boot, Akane kept the two charming Tengu youkai serving them busy with multiple orders for the kitchen. Bread. Meat. Fruit. She scarcely noticed Otto staring at her impressive appetite.

By time she was finished, plates had formed into small towers along the table and Akane's shirt had ridden up to slightly exposed her noticeably rounder middle.
12121221.title: We Interrupt These Messages to Bring You Food

12121222.content:
The trek up the plateau was no less arduous than it looked, to the point where she questioned why she left Brave in the stables to begin with. Surely it would be easier if she had her faithful steed by her side.

Not only was it long, the path was also one of temptation. How one trail could play host to so many taverns, bakeries, wineries, and various other food providers was beyond her. Luckily, as a knight of Gloria, her iron armor was only matched by her will of steel. That and her escort, who eventually revealed his name was Otto, moved at a brisk pace that suggested he would accept no delays.

With Otto's careful guidance, Akane was led to the castle without fault. He even managed to secure her an audience with the king! Said audience apparently was being held in his dining hall.

"Salutations, knight Akane! I was just informed of your arrival. Come, come! Sit at our table, there's plenty of food to go around, we'd appreciate the company."

The King of Gloria wasn't lying, spread across the oaken tables was a bevy of produce. She was beginning to see why Griffin could afford so many food producers. Laid out before her was the largest display of roasted meat, candied nuts, sliced fruit, and freshly baked bread the kitsune had ever seen. It took all her effort not to drool over the food.

"Well, will you join us?"
12121222.title: The Etiquette of Eating with Kings

12122.content: Ah the late teens, the proto-typical age of squires becoming Knights. Now what race would you be?

121221.content:
So you're a human eh? Well then I suppose it's time to begin your story.

You arrived at Griffin and brought Brave to a halt as you tied him to a post and entered the castle.

Approaching you knocked on the door, and shortly after a servant opened the door.

"Excuse me sir, what business do you have here?"

"I am a knight from Gloria, I'm here to deliver documents for my liege lord," you say handing him a letter. Reading it quickly the ratlike youkai bowed. "Of course sir, please allow me to lead you to the Master."

Following the older Youkai you noticed how marvelous the castle of Griffin was. The master of this castle must've been very wealthy. Still you had to make a good impression and marveling at the abode might make them think you were still inexperienced.

Eventually you were led to a grand room where the balding youkai looked at you.

"The master will be here soon, please wait for him."

"I will." you said calmly as he left. For a time you were alone in the room by yourself until you noticed a noise. A second later someone ran into the room, huffing and puffing.

She was a tall, orange haired woman with light blue eyes and a rather nice hourglass shape. Immediately you noticed her foxlike ears and tail. She was a Yokai. "Damn pests." she swore in annoyance, not noticing you until after you spoke, "Uh, hello."

"Hello." you replied a bit awkwardly. You then introduced yourself and then asked who she was.

"I'm Sariana..."
121221.title: Human

12123.content: So you are a veteran eh? You have some scruff growing, maybe a mustache if you like, or hell maybe even a beard! But what race are you?

12133.content: How about more scaly youkai?
12133.title: more choices.

121332.content: Okay while we're still on scaly how about a Lizard/Dragon-Youkai?
121332.title: moving on.

1213322.content: How about Mermaids? They can be Youkai as well. Not to mention a whole diversity of Fish-girls(like Whale-Girls, Shark-Girls, etc)
